Hello,

At this moment, a new company called Publiqs.net (there is a public WHOIS available) is trying to setup their first line of VPS-servers. Therefore, we are trying to find out what our customers want. For us, it is important to first see how many customers would like to have their own VPS-servers with us. This way, we can always improve our service, because we absolutely want our customers to be satisfied for the full 100 percent.

Therefore, we are offering a VPS for EUR 5 per month, in a limited edition. Of course, we are providing as great service as you would need. Because this is a test situation, we do not yet have a hosting division on our website. You could see this as an offside-test to measure the popularity of VPS servers. 

 **We are offering**
<pre>
 2 GB RAM
 2 GHz processor
100 GB HDD
100Mbps network speed
Location: France
Geo-located IP-address: Portugal, Ireland, Czech, Lithuania, Finland, Belgium, Great-Brittain, Germany, Poland, France, Spain, The Netherlands.
LINUX ONLY!
Spam, DDoS and other illegal stuff is not allowed, of course!
No open proxies
</pre>

5 EUR PM. Payment via Paypal or bank deposit (IBAN). This is a LIMITED offer.

If you would like to have more information, just send me a message and I will do my best to provide you the information needed.

Thanks,
Dennis
